decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly building up your board presence with aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Heartfire Hero, while using cards like Infuriate and Monstrous Rage to pump up your creatures and deal damage to your opponent. The inclusion of creatures like Kumano Faces Kakkazan and Slickshot Show-Off adds additional reach and removal options to the strategy. Utilizing burn spells like Reckless Rage and Fatal Push allows for efficient removal of opposing threats, while maximizing your own offensive pressure with cards like Callous Sell-Sword and Emberheart Challenger.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays and disrupting your opponent's strategy. It utilizes cards like Thoughtseize and Duress to control the board and remove threats. Bloodtithe Harvester and Blade of the Oni provide consistent damage to pressure your opponent. The deck also includes powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to further control the game. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the aggressive strategy, allowing for efficient casting of spells. Overall, this deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure victory through aggressive plays and disruption.

The main concept of this Aggro - Humans deck is to deploy a fast and aggressive board presence using low-cost creatures like Hopeful Initiate and Dauntless Bodyguard, supported by powerful Human synergies such as Thalia's Lieutenant and Adeline, Resplendent Cathar. Thalia, Guardian of Thraben provides disruption for the opponent's spells, while Reflector Mage can temporarily neutralize threats. The deck also includes protection for key creatures like Kytheon, Hero of Akros and interaction with cards like Get Lost. The mana base includes lands like Mutavault and Cavern of Souls to support the tribal theme.

The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and disruption effects. By utilizing cards like Archon of Emeria and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben to slow down the opponent's plays, while playing aggressive creatures like Werefox Bodyguard and Skyclave Apparition to apply pressure, this deck aims to assert board control and push for a quick victory. The inclusion of cards like Collected Company and Enduring Innocence allows for additional flexibility and versatility in the deck's strategy.

The deck focuses on using cheap spells and card draw to quickly fill the graveyard with Arclight Phoenixes and then bring them back onto the battlefield for a fast and aggressive win. The key strategy revolves around efficiently cycling through cards with spells like Opt and Sleight of Hand to trigger the Phoenix's ability, while also maintaining control of the board with removal spells like Fiery Impulse and Lightning Axe. The inclusion of Treasure Cruise and Artist's Talent helps the deck maintain card advantage and further fuel the graveyard recursion of Arclight Phoenix.

This deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence with aggressive artifact creatures like Legion Extruder and Voldaren Epicure, then powering them up with Ensoul Artifact. The deck's land base includes a mix of red and blue mana sources to support spells like Torch the Tower and Shrapnel Blast for direct damage. Spyglass Siren and Shadowspear provide additional utility and evasion, while Spell Pierce and Cryptic Coat help protect your key threats. The goal is to overwhelm your opponent with fast, efficient creatures and burn spells.

This deck focuses on aggressive play with a combination of removal spells and efficient creatures. It aims to control the board with cards like Fatal Push and Heartless Act while dealing damage quickly with creatures like Bloodtithe Harvester and Unstoppable Slasher. The deck also utilizes cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker for added flexibility and disruption. With a mix of powerful creatures and removal, the Rakdos Aggro archetype looks to apply pressure early and maintain control throughout the game.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on aggressive play, utilizing cards like Bloodtithe Harvester and Mutavault to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The deck includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Sokenzan, Crucible of Defiance add powerful creatures to the mix. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain tempo throughout the game to overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up your mana using green creatures like Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic, then utilize cards like Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx and Leyline of the Guildpact to generate large amounts of mana. This mana is then used to cast powerful green creatures like Old-Growth Troll and Cavalier of Thorns, while also benefiting from the devotion to green with cards like Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner. The deck aims to overwhelm your opponent with aggressive plays and efficient mana usage to secure victory.
